text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Louisiana Governor Edwards reiterated Sunday that last month's Mardi Gras celebrations weren't cancelled or downsized amid concerns about the coronavirus, because "not one person" at the federal level directed the state to take such action.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
